column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Yung says : " Of course not !
#Text=He looked me in the eye and said ... " King Bumi says : " I 'm going to do ... nothing !
#Text=" Yung says : " It does n't matter now .
#Text=Fighting the Fire Nation is the only path to freedom .
#Text=And freedom is worth dying for .
#Text=" Aang says : " Actually there 's another path to freedom .
#Text=You could leave Omashu .
#Text=You 're directing all your energy to fight the Fire Nation .
#Text=But you 're outnumbered .
#Text=You ca n't win .
#Text=Now 's the time to retreat , so you can live to fight another day .
#Text=" Yung says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=They 've taken our home , and we have to fight them at any cost !
#Text=" Resistance fighter # 1 says : " I do n't know , Yung , living to fight another day is startin ' to sound pretty good to me .
#Text=" Resistance fighter # 2 says : " Yeah , I 'm with the kid !
#Text=" Yung says : " Fine .
#Text=But there 's thousands of citizens that need to leave .
#Text=How 're we going to get them all out ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Suckers !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're all about to come down with a nasty case of pentapox .
#Text="
